alert.note: Alert for Livingston; St. John The Baptist; St. Tammany; Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 5:22PM CDT until July 22 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern St. John The Baptist Parish in southeastern Louisiana... West central St. Tammany Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East central Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southern Tangipahoa Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 522 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Springfield to near Ponchatoula, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hammond, Ponchatoula, Albany, Madisonville, Springfield, Killian and W Lk Pontchartrain Buoy. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 28 and 50. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 13 and 30. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Livingston; St. John The Baptist; St. Tammany; Tangipahoa
